data.name: Twerk Hero 2: More Jiggle
data.detailed_description:
Twerk Hero 2: More Jiggle is a Dance/Rhythm/Twerk and Customization Simulator with many unique features. It is a sequel to Twerk Hero, a small mobile game which created it's own genre and spawned a number of copycats. We saw that there is a potential in our own niche and we decided to expand on it with better gameplay, new gameplay mode, custom clothes, many unique characters to dance with, a city to explore and story to go through. It goes something like this...

One day, minding your own business, you receive a call from a mysterious caller, who tells you that every 12,000 years there is a dancing competition between the best dancers from the Universe, to decide which worlds will have the ability to dance and who won't. He also tells you that is is a prerecorded message. So you decide to try dancing and recording yourself doing it, in hopes of attracting fellow dancers to help you in this world-bending quest. And they come...

Features:

• Over 50 Twerk and Rhythm levels to dance and master.

• Huge City to explore and many locations to visit.

• Hundreds of Characters to meet and hire to dance for you, from anime girls to really ugly monsters.

• Clothes from real-world brands to customize your character and then purchase them for yourself straight from the game.

• Mod Support for those with more imagination and less inhibitions.

• Story comparable only to latest Hollywood Blockbusters (we are a small indie company after all).

Coming out Q4 '22

data.short_description: Twerk Hero 2: More Jiggle is a Dance/Rhythm/Twerk and Customization Simulator with many unique features. Twerk through the story, hire many interesting characters to dance with, explore a huge city and even customize your main character with clothes from real-world fashion brands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: After 2014
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: After 2014
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Processor: After 2014
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
